attributes.action: Waive visas now for Ukrainians so they may freely and legally enter the UK
attributes.additional_details: We must generously welcome Ukrainians fleeing the war, and demonstrate that we unequivocally stand with Ukraine in this time of crisis.
attributes.background: Follow the example of Ireland and other European countries and immediately allow people from Ukraine to freely and legally enter the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
